document_data.name: Haklisstyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Haklisstyr''' was a [[wizard]] from [[Selgaunt]] in the early-to-mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, [[Ilthond]] carried a [[scroll]] of a [[spell]] akin to ''[[teleport]],'' which he had purloined from Haklisstyr after knifing him with a [[poison]]ed [[dagger]] in the back, strongly implying he had been his apprentice. Though Ilthond was young, the date of the event was unknown.
